moments.quote: And uh you know for us this psalm speaks of the church. The church is also a fortress city uh the pillar and foundation of truth as St. Paul says in first Timothy. You know, so the the Bible uses fire and air and water uh over and over again as these images of the Holy Spirit that flows through the church conveyed to us in the waters of the baptism and also in the flow of the eucharistic blood, the blood and water that flowed from the side of Christ.
